column5: Comfortable and private guest room with a queen size bed, desk, couch, TV, attached bathroom and more, located all by itself on the first floor of a 3 story downtown townhome. Enjoy the privacy of staying on your own floor, coming and going as you please using keypad locks and your own personal pass-code while at the same time enjoying all the comforts of home including a kitchen, living/dining area, covered parking, laundry and a rooftop terrace with a spectacular view of the Dallas skyline.
